dict.acceptation: 承诺，许诺；委任，委托；致力，献身；承担义务；

sent.orig: Commitment of assets into a holding company is a commitment, rather than commitment to the Company.
sent.trans: 资产注入的承诺是属于控股公司的承诺，而非本公司的承诺。

sent.orig: He makes no commitment to her; he is a total commitment-phobe.
sent.trans: 他对她不肯作出承诺；他是一位憎恶承诺的人。

sent.orig: A commitment is only commitment, because it has no expiration date.
sent.trans: 承诺之所以是承诺，是因为没有截至时间。

sent.orig: Commitment is not commitment without two consenting parties.
sent.trans: 承诺如不是双方认可的就不成其为承诺。

sent.orig: There is certain amount of time resource commitment involved although there is no joining fee commitment.
sent.trans: 商校伙伴计划并不会徵收任何费用，但参与的公司需拨出时间资源予有关的同事。
